entities.name: AI
entities.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a technology incorporated into many products and services, posing risks and challenges, including ethical issues and compliance with government regulations.

entities.name: SHAREHOLDERS
entities.description: Shareholders and other stakeholders are increasingly concerned with the environmental, social, and governance (ESG) practices of companies.

entities.name: COMPANIES
entities.description: Organizations that are scrutinized by shareholders and other stakeholders regarding their ESG and sustainability practices.

entities.name: IP
entities.description: Intellectual Property (IP) rights that companies must protect, sometimes involving lawsuits or legal proceedings alleging patent infringement or other IP rights violations.

relationships.relationship_description: Companies incorporate AI into their products and services, posing risks and challenges, including ethical issues and compliance with government regulations.
Shareholders scrutinize the ESG practices of companies, impacting their reputation and business activities.
